entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: use lowercase email for GSI by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1461

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.7...v2.15.8

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1463
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1462
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1464
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1470
  • Typo in en-us.json by @marcocucinato in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1469
  • Create Label group tests by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1465
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1471
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1472

New Contributors

  • @marcocucinato made their first contribution in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1469

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.8...v2.15.9
